text: HTr wrlv ~THI uiaarut THN /Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 Qa67, 73v War7 37 TrThT +ATTT4 YS4 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India QAH Extn:- 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) 4-5 Td 6, 41z7-10, ETrGT, # faa-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No: 11041/3/2005-Admn 9"h February 2009 CIRCULAR Sub: Preparation of replies to Parliament Questions -reg; MoSRTAH has observed that replies to parliament questions received from NHAI are often delayed resulting in further delay in preparation of final replies by MoSRTAH In order to   streamline the existing procedure for preparation of replies to parliament   questions the matter was re-examined and it has been decided to revise the existing procedure with a view to providing a speedy and institutionalized response to parliament questions  Accordingly, the following procedure will be adopted with immediate effect for preparation of these replies: The   existing parliament   cell headed by GM (Admn & Coord) will serve as the coordinating cell on issues relating to parliament. b) Parliament Cell  will continue to be the nodal agency for receipt of questions and forwarding of replies to MoSRTAH Nodal officers appointed for preparation of replies will henceforth prepare full, complete and approved replies to questions assigned to them by the Parliament Cell even if subject matter of some parts 0f the question do not pertain to his area of responsibilities. The questions received in Admn Division, be assigned to a nodal  officer by DGMAdmn) for preparation of complete and final approved reply, in the following manner: 1) The question will be assigned to the nodal officer to which sub part (a) pertains. ii) If sub part (a) pertains to more than one nodal officer, the nodal officer who has to deal with majority of the question will be assigned the question. iii) Where sub part (a) pertains to entire NHDP, the question will be assigned by Admn. Division to each nodal officer by rotation The decision of the Admn Division on this issue will be final. Nodal officer IT division will not be assigned the responsibility for preparation of full and complete However; Other nodal officers may collect information from IT division by marking the question to nodal officer IT division Cont .
